title: kanatta shOka
sahitya:
kanatta shOka vAridhi yatilayyO tE kamanI maNi muLukiDunnu


anupallavi

  ninaccummuhurapi bhavanE nishvasiccum niravadhi 
nanaccum kucakugmagaLam nayana vAri koNDanisham


caraNam 1    pancasAyakan coriyum bAnagaNamETTu hanta cancala dhritiyAiparam sarasA vaLunnengilum
vancana veDinju bhavAn vannorikkal puNarumennu nenjakamattil karulti nIradAnga maruvIDunnu
    caraNam 2    naLina nayana shrI padmanAbha vaikIDAte kaLavANi mAraDikUppum 
kAmini tannarikil cennuvaLarum sOkamakhilam mrdu vacasA shamipiccan 
poDu kuLir kongaiyil puNarnnu bata kundaradaya ramayanAtha
